file_insights.changes_summary: Added aria-label attributes to three action IconButtons for improved accessibility

specific_changes.change: Added aria-label="Edit meeting" to Edit IconButton
specific_changes.purpose: Accessibility - provides screen reader label for edit action

specific_changes.change: Added aria-label="Delete meeting" to Delete IconButton
specific_changes.purpose: Accessibility - provides screen reader label for delete action

specific_changes.change: Added aria-label="Close details" to Close IconButton
specific_changes.purpose: Accessibility - provides screen reader label for close action

patterns_discovered.description: Adding aria-label attributes to icon-only buttons that already have title attributes
patterns_discovered.context: MeetingsPage uses both title and aria-label for redundant but complementary accessibility support

patterns_discovered.description: Targeting specific UI components with accessibility gaps rather than wholesale refactoring
patterns_discovered.context: Only action buttons received aria-labels, not all buttons on the page
patterns_discovered.implication: Suggests a methodical, phased approach to accessibility improvements

gotchas_discovered.description: Icon-only buttons lack sufficient semantic information for screen readers without aria-label
gotchas_discovered.note: Having both title and aria-label is appropriate - title provides hover text, aria-label provides screen reader text

gotchas_discovered.description: Only 3 specific buttons were updated; other icon buttons on the page may lack aria-labels
gotchas_discovered.note: This appears to be intentional scope limiting to action buttons rather than an oversight

approach_outcome.strategy: Targeted accessibility enhancement for action buttons
approach_outcome.execution: Direct code modification with clear, semantic aria-label values matching existing title attributes
approach_outcome.efficiency: Single commit, one file modified, minimal changes required
approach_outcome.accessibility_impact: High - improves screen reader experience for critical user actions (edit, delete, close)
approach_outcome.code_quality: Good - consistent naming pattern for aria-labels matches existing title text

recommendations.recommendation: Audit remaining IconButtons on MeetingsPage for aria-label coverage
recommendations.rationale: Only 3 of potentially more icon buttons received aria-labels; ensure consistency across all non-text buttons

recommendations.recommendation: Consider creating a reusable IconButton wrapper component with built-in aria-label enforcement
recommendations.rationale: Would prevent future gaps and ensure accessibility patterns are standardized across the codebase

recommendations.recommendation: Test with screen readers to verify aria-label values are clear and appropriate
recommendations.rationale: While changes appear correct, screen reader testing would validate the accessibility improvement

recommendations.recommendation: Document the accessibility pattern used (title + aria-label) for future developers
recommendations.rationale: Helps maintain consistency when new icon buttons are added to the codebase
